div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 675 Cojeasca, c. 40 km. NNW of Bucha- (257) rest, Rumania, 1936 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: 120-150 AR. Pot hoard Macedonia, 1st Region: 19 tetradr. Macedonia, 2nd Region: 1 tetradr. Thasos: 14 spread-flan tetradr. Geto-Dacian imit.: 11 tetradr. Disposition: Bucharest (Acad.) 45 as listed Paucker, CNA 1939, pp. 154-5 Moisil, Balcania 1944, p. 16, illus. (2 Maced.)
